extendedInfo.description: This Arnold soundboard is probably the funniest collection of Arnold Schwarzenegger sounds, insults, and phrases.  Categories include questions, answers, cool, and angry.  The Terminator soundboard provides hours of fun.Long press to save to SD card and use as ringtonesArnold SchwarzeneggerSoundsSoundboardRingtonesFunnyMovies and characters that Arnold Schwarzenegger has appeared in:The Expendables Trench (uncredited)2004 Around the World in 80 Days Prince Hapi2003 Terminator 3: Rise of the Machines (Video Game) The Terminator (voice) (also archive footage)2003 The Rundown Bar Patron (uncredited)2003 Terminator 3: Rise of the Machines Terminator2002 Collateral Damage Gordy Brewer2000 The 6th Day Adam Gibson1999 End of Days Jericho Cane1997 Batman & Robin Mr. Freeze / Dr. Victor Fries1996 Jingle All the Way Howard Langston1996 Eraser U.S. Marshal John 'The Eraser' Kruger1996 T2 3-D: Battle Across Time (short) The Terminator1994 Junior Dr. Alex Hesse1994 True Lies Harry Tasker1993 Last Action Hero Jack Slater / Himself1992 Lincoln (TV movie) John G. Nicolay (voice)1992 Christmas in Connecticut (TV movie) Man in chair in front of Media Truck (uncredited)1992 Terminator 2: Judgment Day (Video Game) The Terminator (voice)1991 Terminator 2: Judgment Day The Terminator1990 Kindergarten Cop Detective John Kimble1990 Total Recall Douglas Quaid / Hauser1990 Tales from the Crypt (TV series) X-Conâ The Switch (1990) â¦ X-Con (uncredited)1988/I Twins Julius Benedict1988 Red Heat Capt. Ivan Danko1987 The Running Man Ben Richards1987 Predator Dutch1986 Raw Deal Mark Kaminsky aka Joseph P. Brenner1985 Commando John Matrix1985 Red Sonja Kalidor1984 The Terminator The Terminator1984 Conan the Destroyer Conan1982 Conan the Barbarian Conan1980 The Jayne Mansfield Story (TV movie) Mickey Hargitay1979 Scavenger Hunt Lars1979 The Villain Handsome Stranger1977 The San Pedro Beach Bums (TV series) Musclemanâ Lifting Is My Life (1977) â¦ Muscleman1977 The Streets of San Francisco (TV series) Josef Schmidtâ Dead Lift (1977) â¦ Josef Schmidt1976 Stay Hungry Joe Santo1974 Happy Anniversary and Goodbye (TV movie) Rico1973 The Long Goodbye Hood in Augustine's office (uncredited)1969 Hercules in New York Hercules (as Arnold Strong 'Mr. Universe')Enjoy this Arnold soundboard!

reviews.title: Ads
reviews.comment: Used this app for a long time.  Recently started popping up ads to web pages.  Uninstalling.
reviews.author: Chris Hartley

reviews.title: Adds
reviews.comment: Like the person that commented below, used this app for a long time but after last update thought my phone caught a virus. It randomly opens play store or other pop-ups to download other apps. Uninstall!!!!
reviews.author: Mihai Melinte

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: This app is fun, entertaining, and is great for making prank calls. I love it.
reviews.author: Jaden Howell

reviews.comment: Decent amount of good Arnie lines
reviews.author: Sam Willstock

reviews.title: TERRIBLE
reviews.comment: It would\'ve been great...IF IT WORKED!
reviews.author: vasiilijan nikolovski

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: It is funny
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ads! Ads everywhere!
reviews.comment: Don\'t install. Very annoying pop up/ browser ads. AVOID THIS!
reviews.author: Jason Haynie

reviews.title: Old dog
reviews.comment: Generally a great app. I don\'t believe it does bot say \" It\'s not a Tumor!\"-
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Mindless fun.  LOVE IT
reviews.comment: Love this app. Can\'t get enough of Arnold shorts.  Great for an instant laugh no matter who you are.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: My favorite soundboard, but...
reviews.comment: This is indeed my favorite soundboard and quite possibly the best,but reading the latest permissions you need to grant for the latest update is complete BS! I need to allow the phone to make calls for me on my behalf?! wtf?? You don\'t need any additional permissions..
reviews.author: Erick Gonzalez

reviews.title: Update \"fix\" not a fix
reviews.comment: I liked it better when you could have multiple sayings overlapping, that made me laugh my butt off.  It\'s still fun, but not as fun as it was.  Should have the ability to turn overlap on and off.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sound cut off, no good for tablets
reviews.comment: Every single sound effect was cut off too soon when played on an Archos 101. No landscape mode or resizing makes it look terrible on a tablet.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very good Arnold sb. Will give 5* after clipping is fixed on \"stop being such a p*ssy\" quote.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best Arnold soundboard
reviews.comment: Forget the other soundboards, this has \"who is your daddy and what does he do?\" And \"get to the chopper!!!\" And all the other quotes you want.
reviews.author: Stephen Kiselewsky

reviews.title: FUNNEST APP EVER!!!
reviews.comment: I\'m impressed by how comprehensive it is, just about every famous quip and then some. Definitely one of the funniest apps ever and never gets old :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I Like Dat
reviews.comment: Great for some quick laughs courtesy of ahhnold.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: This thing is sweet...
reviews.comment: ...sound quality isn\'t 10/10 but that\'s not your fault. 5 stars.  Edit: I got bored after 7 minutes. (stop whining)
reviews.author: Benjamin L.

reviews.title: Kits still worth getting for now
reviews.comment: I would give it five stars it the sound was cleaner, some r great. Also it would b nice if when u press the button multiple times u get that screwed and chop effect.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It\'s not a tumor!
reviews.comment: Read my contacts and call them! Waaaaa why does it read my contacts!? Waaaaa! Fags..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Funny!
reviews.comment: Funniest app I\'ve had for a while. Hours of fun!
reviews.author: A Google User
